title: Only Russia could be behind UK poison attack - toxin's co-developer
text:
Only Russia could be behind UK poison attack - toxin's co-developer 9:15am GMT - 01:17 
A Russian chemist who helped develop the Soviet-era nerve agent used to poison a former Russian double agent in southern England said on Tuesday only the Russian government could have carried out an attack with such a deadly and advanced toxin. Rough cut - no reporter narration.
